# bitWidth

**Type Property**

The number of bits used for the underlying binary representation of values of this type.

## Declaration

```swift
static var bitWidth: Int { get }
```

## Discussion

The bit width of a `UInt` instance is 32 on 32-bit platforms and 64 on 64-bit platforms.
title: bitWidth
